title: The Silence of the Hucows
description: All Melissa DeVries wanted was a break, a change of pace from her boring job and her even more boring life. That change comes when she receives an email from an admirer, a man who seems to know her better than she knows herself, and who draws her into his web of milky intrigue. this ebook contains lactation, masturbation, bondage, large breasts, and fantasy violence.
author: Big Kahuna
